data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Shradha Infraprojects Limited has informed the Exchange about General Updates regarding Execution of Sale Deed by Solus Ventures LLP (Fellow Subsidiary of the Company and Subsidiary of Active Infrastructures Limited, which in turn is a Subsidiary of Shradha Infraprojects Limited) ( the Buyer ) with M/s. Sarthak Electromech Private Limited ( the Seller ), for purchase of the property, for a total lump sum consideration of INR 37,17,50,000/- (Indian Rupees Thirty-Seven Crore Seventeen Lakh Fifty Thousand only).

data.caption: Corrigendum
data.news_body: Shradha Infraprojects Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Time of EGM: The covering letter submitted with the EGM Notice mentioned the meeting time as 11:00 A.M. The correct time of the EGM is 11:30 A.M., as stated in the Notice.
